Hundreds of people asking him to build radios =3D excellent business opport=
unity.



--- On Mon, 6/1/09, Elaine Coates <cozykat2003@...> wrote:
=

From: Elaine Coates <cozykat2003@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Differe=
nt chip config.
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, June 1, 2009, 5:0=
1 AM











    
            
            


      
      Maybe you cou=
ld just ask for the schematic and get somebody else to build it for you.=A0=
 Why inundate Frank with building all these radios?=A0 There are lots of qu=
alified electronics gurus out there that could make one up for you.=A0 If I=
 were Frank I would not want hundreds of people asking me to build their ra=
dios.=A0 That could get out of hand.





From: "Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.f=
ransen@ delta.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Monday, June 1, 2009 =
7:16:14 AM
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.




There are alot=
 of people who would like Frank to make a box for them ( including me).
I t=
hink we would all furnish whatever he needed or just purchase a box from hi=
m.
Frank doesn't want to sell anything that is not perfected, but none of t=
his is a guarantee
that you will get some kind of spirit communication.
I w=
onder if Chris Moon has thought about how his profits are going to decline =
if Frank
makes boxes to sell ?
=A0



From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailt=
o:EVP- ITC@yahoogroups. com] On Behalf Of SnowfireL@aol. com
Sent: Friday, =
May 29, 2009 11:21 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] D=
ifferent chip config.





Well, I wouldn't mind having a Frank's box, I wo=
uld be more then glad to buy one from him should he wish ever to make one f=
or me, =A0I would like it's wood painted in an azure blue trim please with =
the rest a natural=A0shade of Mahogany (if can be found) or aromatic cedar =
(and=A0I would be glad to supply the=A0wood as, I have hundreds of tress=A0=
here.=A0<s>sf

ght Time, april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com writes:







I think the b=
ottom line is we all know that Chris Moon is probably just trying to use yo=
u. He'll suck you dry and toss you aside when he gets his fill.

From: Fransen, Debbie 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com=
 
Sent: Friday, May 29, 2009 7:45 AM
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Different chip =
config.




Exactly my point... You don't charge anything for the boxes
and=
 Chris Moon charges people for using it....
If it's not perfected then Chri=
s shouldn't charge either......
If he wasn't so public with it, then people=
 like me wouldn't dislike him so much.
=A0
The only people that have your b=
oxes (that the public hear about)
are the well known paranormal groups and =
famous people.
I am sure that you have given boxes to researchers who are n=
ot in the popular
paranormal community ,and don't want to be. Those are the=
 ones that should
get respect.=A0 And of course YOU are well respected by u=
s lowly researchers. ( Kissin up , so you won't get mad)
=A0
And I am sure =
that you are sick of hearing about Chris Moon and how
alot of people thinks=
 he sucks. And everyone wants a box......
But you have to expect that. You =
are the only one out there that is honest and
doesn't want to be famous.
I =
know this is like beating a dead horse, so I will shut up now.... :)
=A0
=
=A0

=A0Frank-S

 2009 at 6:16 AM, Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fransen@ delta.com> wrote:

highly of you.





From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
To: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Thursday, May 28, 2009 2:29:09 PM
Subject: Re=
: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.



Besides--I didn't like that radio des=
ign, it's too complex, and the documentation is screwy. I did a simpler rad=
io last night that should be better, simpler, cheaper, and clearer sound. 
=


On Thu, May 28, 2009 at 5:41 AM, Elaine Coates <cozykat2003@ yahoo.com> w=
rote:










The jpg for this schematic is kind of blurry in places.=A0 =
Is there any way a more clear copy could be send to me? I would be forever =
grateful.=A0 Thanks Frank - Elaine






From: Frank Sumption <purplealieng=
irl@ gmail.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Thursday, May 28, 2009 1=
2:55:00 AM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.




http://purplea=
lieng irl.tripod. com/ 

=A0
=A0However, it's constantly changing. The radi=
o I made tonight is very simple, and can significantly simplify constructio=
n. I used to make the sweep and amplifier circuits, then use a commercial r=
adio, like the 12-469, as a tuner. 
=A0
=A0The MK484 is follwed by a couple=
 high impedence op amp stages to bring the audio up to line levels. I haven=
't had time to do schematic yet. I draw the schematics with MS paint, and t=
hey are stored as jpeg images, which isn't=A0the best, but it makes them e-=
mailable. 
=A0
=A0Frank-S



On Wed, May 27, 2009 at 8:54 PM, Elaine Coates=
 <cozykat2003@ yahoo.com> wrote:











Hi folks, I just joined this gr=
oup.=A0 I was recently at the Lizzy Borden house in Massachusetts with Chri=
s Moon and had a session with Frank's Box.=A0 The results were astounding.=
=A0 Is this the newest schematic for Frank's box?=A0 If so, is there a way =
to get a clearer copy of it?=A0 My son said he would build one for me and I=
 have been searching for the schematic.=A0 Can anyone help? - Elaine






=
From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups .=
com; grassharp@yahoogrou ps.com 

Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 5:45:16 PM
=
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config. [1 Attachment]






=A0I think I=
 followed an erroneous LM3820 layout, so I'm going to breadboard this layou=
t. Note the antenna input is now on pin 12-11, this is the RF amp input, an=
d pin 13 is the RF amp output, which feeds pin 1.
=A0
=A0'case anyone cares=
. 
=A0
=A0F-S


































Discover the variety of Bis=
quick=AE mix. Get Recipes Savings Now.

 

      

    
    
	
	 
	
	





=
